# Business, industry and regional outreach

Business, industry and regional outreach
Page Content

​​​​The Department has dedicated Business, Industry and Regional Outreach (BIRO) officers to provide information on migration to:

​​​​The Department has dedicated Business, Industry and Regional Outreach (BIRO) officers to provide information on migration to:
- business
business
- industry, including professional and industry associations and unions
industry, including professional and industry associations and unions
- government agencies at all levels
government agencies at all levels
- regional Australia stakeholders.
regional Australia stakeholders.

BIRO officers engage with stakeholders across the country to increase understanding of visa pathway options to help employers fill vacant positons where Australian workers are unavailable.

BIRO officers engage with stakeholders across the country to increase understanding of visa pathway options to help employers fill vacant positons where Australian workers are unavailable.

If you would like to find out about upcoming outreach events in your local area, please use thiscontact form.

If you would like to find out about upcoming outreach events in your local area, please use this
contact form
.

## Using a migration agent

Using a migration agent

BIRO officers cannot provide migration advice to individuals.

BIRO officers cannot provide migration advice to individuals.

If you would like independent migration advice, you can use a registeredmigration agent. You can also speak to a legal practitioner. Only registered migration agents and legal practitioners can charge for immigration assistance.

If you would like independent migration advice, you can use a registered
migration agent
. You can also speak to a legal practitioner. Only registered migration agents and legal practitioners can charge for immigration assistance.
